thread.title: Minor travelling with OCI on old passport and new passport
thread.title_full: Minor travelling with OCI on old passport and new passport

author: Globetrotter999
title: Minor travelling with OCI on old passport and new passport
text: # 1 Hi My daughter has got an OCI on old UK passport and had new UK passport issued on Mar 2015. I am planing to travelling to UK from Delhi next week with our daughter, will it be OK if I carry both passports and and the OCI card? I read somewhere that for minors below 20 years age OCI needs to be transferred to new card. Has any of travelled with their kids rcently on similar situation?
